form.official-title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to provide housing for students enrolled in an accredited avionic program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Avionic Students Housing Act.

subsection.text: Chapter 401 of title 49, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following:

An airport, airport authority, airport sponsor, school or other airport operator may provide housing for students enrolled in an accredited avionic program, on the non-aeronautical area grounds of an airport. Such housing may be for a term of 12 months, renewable to a total duration of the lesser ofâ€”

In this section, the term avionic program means a program leading to a degree, certification or qualifications for a career as a pilot, mechanic, air traffic controller, airline support personnel, or other avionics-related field.
